Reviews.Title: This Is actually a upgrade from my D5100, annd My D90 in many aspects !!
Reviews.Author: joshua fortini
Reviews.Content: I have Been a hobby photographer for the last 25 years and a professional for the last 3 years, and the D3100 has a great array of all of the professional (options) to fine tune the perfect shot with Active D-Lighting (d=dynamic) it literally shoots with active d lighting or can be edited with D-Lighting in the camera pre transfer. Also this camera has an auto, and auto guide mode for beginners to help an amatuer work their way to learning how to use all of those fancy ( P, S, A, M ) modes and how to use them Highly reccomended for the beginer that wants to get more than just a point and shoot, with the ability to be also just a point and shoot and MUCH MUCH more, as a avid NIKON shooter I have more experience with Nikons than most I also carry a coolpix s6000 around to light test. My only Must have with a D3100 is a SDHC memory card with a rating of 8-10 for the 1080 HD video and a tripod. and when using the camera for video leave it on the tripod !! if in video mode it can have a wabbly look if it is panned to fast or moved a bit too quickly !! a tripod is the 1 of 2 must haves #2 again a SDHC memory card with a 8-10 rating (the rating on a memory card is a small # in a circle) it has nothing to do with size. It affects how quickly information can be written on the card !!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for DSLR beginners
Reviews.Author: erik b. prestbury
Reviews.Content: This camera is very effective. Photos are razor sharp and crystal clear, and the guide mode is perfect for beginner to intermediate photographers. The auto focus is fast and the vibration reduction is rock steady in the kit NIKKOR 18-55mm lens. The body color is a nice change of pace from the usual black, silver, and gray cameras out there.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: GutierrezY
Reviews.Content: The camera was perfect and looked just like new. The red color is gorgeous and the picture quality is amazing. Great for those who want to get a start using DSLR's. a great buy in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Neat Nikon
Reviews.Author: EnVee
Reviews.Content: My first real decent digital camera.I am loving it.Thought it would be a bit intimidating but is pretty self explanatory & has been(so far)easy to use.Love the pictures it's taken & also takes video.Great to use for travel or for every day family & friend pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3100 Digital SLR Camera
Reviews.Author: Pookey
Reviews.Content: This is the finest digital camera I have every owned.  It provides many excellent features, and options. It is very easy to operate, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great digital SLR.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Aris Jackson "TisGreek2Me"
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera.  It is user friendly. I bought it for my daughter who has never used anything but a camera on a phone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Brian W Armstrong
Reviews.Content: Truly a great camera at a great price!Like a pre owned automobile, just makes sense saving a huge amount of money, for a product which is just like new!!Wonderful buy!Thank you

Reviews.Title: Best buy sells for $389.99
Reviews.Author: ShahRukh Khan
Reviews.Content: Buy it at Best Buy for just $389.99.... Reg. price is $499.99 for this .. I don't know why Amazon says reg. price %599.99 and on sale for $499.99. RIP OFF MUCH.LOVE THIS CAM.

Reviews.Title: bestbuy
Reviews.Author: oscar arrington
Reviews.Content: Just got this at best buy for $349. Same kit, same lens, same camera. I also added a two year geek squad warranty for $60.

Reviews.Title: Good,Good,Good
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: I have used a simple point and shoot digital camera for years. I have an old Nikon 35mm with lenses and all but when it became impossible to get film I went to a point and shoot.I have been eyeing this camera for a few years and finally got one.I was not disappointed. This takes great pictures. Very clear and tack sharp.I like the ruby color as its a great change from the basic black.I recommend this camera for all beginners and amateurs.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera, not a fan of video
Reviews.Author: DIYDanielle "DIYDanielle"
Reviews.Content: This camera really has made a huge difference in my "photography." I am a mother and also have my own website where I blog about crafts and other DIY projects that I do so I needed a great camera to capture everything. Initially I used the automatic settings a lot which produces a very nice photo, but I took a very quick course (2 hrs) from a local photographer and I'm able to take VERY good photos now. I still use my iPhone5 for the quick stuff and for video, but for high quality pictures this is my go-to. It's very easy to use once you get a good idea about what you're doing with it. The red color is very pretty too.I liked that this offered a video option but at this point I have yet to capture a decent video on it... I recently messed with some settings so it might be better now, but I haven't checked. Prior to changing settings, my iPhone took better video. Note that the factory settings aren't really as good as what you can set it up as with a little photography knowledge so it's worth taking a course ASAP so you can improve your photo quality.I ended up purchasing this refurbished off a vendor on Ebay for a slightly lower price, but Amazon had the lowest price otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Looks great, fits perfectly into handbag
Reviews.Author: Nureen Hanisah Mohamad Zaki
Reviews.Content: Perfect DSLR for starters or just to get nice pictures! I ordered the red one, and I absolutely love the edge look and the shiny feeling..

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Randy Harshaw
Reviews.Content: As a beginner, I love this camera. It functions easily for the basics and challenges me to be a better photographer by offering more complex options as I learn. It takes great quality pictures and I can't wait to take it to the mountains!

Reviews.Title: I'M READY FOR MY CLOSE UP
Reviews.Author: Belinda A
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. I am not a professional photographer nor am I a beginner. That said let me say this camera makes me feel like a pro. The shots are crisp, clear and true to color. I am still learning all the different functions so I will have to return to update after I learn more about my new camera. I would recomend this camera to all who want to learn how to take beautiful pictures. If it's just a point and shoot you want, well this one is good for that but it would be a shame not to learn how to take advantage of all it's feature. So I say buy and learn. You will love the pictures you can capture with this camera. The body is easy to hold and the lenses go on and off with ease.  So get yourself this camera and head out to grab some great shots!!

Reviews.Title: I love my Nikon
Reviews.Author: Kerry Wagner
Reviews.Content: This camera takes awesome pictures.  It is easy to operate and takes great pictures weather you are a beginner or professional.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera, I guess
Reviews.Author: Russell Kitchner
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for our son, and although he exchanged it for a black version, he is really enjoying the camera. Thinking about buying another for our daughter, and hope that someday we can afford to buy one for ourselves. ; )

Reviews.Title: FINALLY IN MY HANDS!
Reviews.Author: Linda Ha
Reviews.Content: I've been wanting this camera for a long time now and now I have it in my hands!The camera takes a while to get use to, but once you get use to it, it works great! It can record videos great too! The mic filters out a lot or most of the ambiance, but you can still a strange humming still, though that isn't a big deal. Everything is still really clear.It is very easy to use and very light in weight.
